title: RBIA Bias Metrics Schema v1
description: Schema capturing model fairness and bias statistics across protected attributes.

protected_attr.description: Protected attribute under evaluation (e.g., gender, region, age_group).

fairness_metric.description: Fairness metric computed for the protected attribute.

value.description: Computed fairness score (absolute difference or ratio).

threshold.description: Threshold above which fairness violation is triggered.

decision_ts.description: Timestamp when the fairness metric was evaluated.

model_id.description: Model identifier related to the bias metric.

metadata.description: Additional context: sample sizes, group ratios, affected entities.
